The objective of this Disclosure Requirement defines the information to be disclosed under ESRS
S1 Disclosure Requirement S1-14 and it describes fatalities to be disclosed that are the result of
work-related injuries and work-related ill health. Hence, ESRS S1 paragraph 88 (e) refers to work-
related ill health.
